name: aws-chat
description: This folder has an example html page that you can use to test your code. You will need the amazon-connect-chat-interface.js compiled code from this project and the example solution to start chat using API Gateway and Lambda backend components as defined in [this GitHub repo](https://github.com/amazon-connect/amazon-connect-chat-ui-examples/tree/master/cloudformationTemplates/startChatContactAPI).
